commit 393fa5b2c4d6e8a0b2d4f6a8c0e2d4f6a8b0c2d4
Author: John Doe <john@example.com>
Date:   Wed Feb 19 09:15:30 2026 +0100

    feat: add `rtk wc` command for compact word/line/byte counts (#175)

    Adds a new `wc` subcommand that provides compact output for word count.
    This reduces token usage by ~80% compared to raw `wc` output.

    Closes #174

commit d196c2d4e6a8b0c2d4f6a8b0c2d4e6a8b0c2d4e6
Author: Jane Smith <jane@example.com>
Date:   Tue Feb 18 20:30:00 2026 +0100

    fix: gh run view drops --log-failed, --log, --json flags (#159)

    The gh run view command was incorrectly stripping important flags.
    This fix preserves all user-specified flags while still filtering output.

Date:   Mon Feb 17 20:00:00 2026 +0100

    fix: install to ~/.local/bin instead of /usr/local/bin (closes #155)

    Changed default install path to respect XDG conventions.
    Falls back to /usr/local/bin if ~/.local/bin doesn't exist.
